page.title: 06LEISURE LIFE IN DUDLEY (3)
page.content: Rag Week - organised by college students who dress up and collect money for charities.There is a fancy dress procession.Jone's fair comes once a year to Buffery park there are fun rides ,game stalls and electric arcade games to play.Two recent events gaining popularity are an annual walk around the Borough trail and fun runs. A small circus also visits once a year.During June ,July and August street entertainers such as brass bands ,morris dancers , circus acts can be seen in Dudley Market Place.Two important attractions in Dudley are the Zoo and the Castle which stands in the grounds of the Zoo.The Castle parts of which date back to Norman times stands overlooking the town.The Zoo lies in attractive gardens surrounding the Castle and attracts many visitors.
